channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: UMG CEO Lucian Grainge Outlines Company’s AI Strategy in New Memo: ‘Enormous Potential’
item.description: 🚀🎶 Dive into the future with UMG's AI strategy! CEO Lucian Grainge is paving the way for innovation and endless possibilities. #MusicTech #Innovation 🤖

item.title: The Hives Announce 2026 North American Tour Dates
item.description: 🎸 Start saving up, The Hives are hitting North America in 2026! Who's ready to rock out with these legends? 🤘 #TheHivesTour2026

item.title: Taylor Swift’s The Life Of A Showgirl Debuts With 4 Million Sales, Occupies Entire Hot 100 Top 10
item.description: 🎉 Taylor Swift is unstoppable! 🌟 The Life Of A Showgirl is dominating the charts like never before! 🎶💥 #TaylorSwift #LifeOfAShowgirl

item.title: Dua Lipa Covers Green Day Song with Surprise Guest Billie Joe Armstrong: Watch
item.description: 🎶 Rock meets pop with @DUALIPA and @billiejoe! Check out their epic collab now! 🤘 #MusicNews #DuaLipa #BillieJoeArmstrong

item.title: Lucy Dacus Performs ‘Best Guess’ for Newlyweds in Officiated Wedding Ceremony on ‘Kimmel’
item.description: Lucy Dacus brings all the feels 🎶 Watch her serenade newlyweds on 'Kimmel'! 💍 #MusicMagic
